#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:50:34

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:54:09

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max += (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min -= (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
 
N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))
 
B = [0] * N
for i in range(N):
    if i % 2 == 0:
        B[i // 2] = A[i]
    else:
        B[N - i // 2 - 1] = A[i]
 
print(*B)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:50:58

import sys

def solve(xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    return x_max - x_min + 1

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def solve(xs, x):

    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():

    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(xs, x))

if __name__ == '__main__':

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:51:24

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max += (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min -= (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)


print(ans)

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs) # sort
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


A, B, C = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(A * B // 2)

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:50:44

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    ans += 1 / A[i]

print(1 / ans)

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)
